dict.string: Play a round of table tennis with Alfred

scoreFile="/tmp/pingpongscore" if [[ ! -f "${scoreFile}" ]]; then echo -n "0" > "${scoreFile}" fi
if [[ "{query}" == "pong" ]]; then score=$[$(cat "${scoreFile}") + 1] echo "${score}" > "${scoreFile}" osascript -e "tell application \"Alfred 2\" to search \"ping\"" else osascript -e "tell application \"Alfred 2\" to search \"scorepingpong\"" fi

echo "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" randomNum="$(grep -m1 -ao '[1-9]' /dev/urandom | head -1)" for (( i = 1; i <= 9; i++ )); do if [[ "${i}" == "${randomNum}" ]]; then smack="Pong!" echo "<item uuid='Smack' valid='yes' arg='pong'>" else smack="Miss!" echo "<item uuid='Smack' valid='yes' arg='miss'>" fi echo "<item uid='Smack' valid='yes' arg='miss'>" echo "<title>${smack}</title>" echo "<icon>icon.png</icon>" echo "</item>" done echo "</items>"
Play a round of table tennis with Alfred

scoreFile="/tmp/pingpongscore" score=$(cat "${scoreFile}")
if [[ "${score}" == "1" ]]; then message="You’ve smacked the ball once." elif [[ "${score}" > "1" ]]; then message="You’ve smacked the ball ${score} times." else message="Call “ping” in Alfred, to start a game." fi
cat << EOF <?xml version='1.0'?><items> <item uuid='Score' valid='no'> <title>PingPong score</title> <subtitle>${message}</subtitle> <icon>icon.png</icon> </item> </items> EOF
rm "${scoreFile}"
Shows how many time you’ve responded
